description: Great 1 bedroom in a beautiful well kept Pre-War Building. Near Prospect Park and Park Slope, nice bars and restaurants in a great neighborhood. (Cats optional!)
name: Lovely apartment near Prospect Park.
review: This is an adorable apartment, very comfortable. We had a great stay. Close to Prospect Park, easy to get to the F/G line. I thought it would be noisy, right on Ocean Pkwy, but it's an interior unit so there was no street noise. Basement laundry is convenient. Thanks for a great stay!
